Text:
Well,ya,sorry,i forgot to say that it will probably only work on x86 os edition.
Works "as is" but i don't have tested it yet on 64 bit.
btw,for complete working program,you must use it online,otherwise certain functions will not be available.

Btw,,install as admin on Vista/Win7 & 8,please.
Otherwise try ChingLiu version (clean file as well) then and sorry again for those where mine does not work,however it should working fine on 32 bit edition anyway.
The best is out now. DVD Cloner 10.0 and 1Click DVD Copy Pro. Those two are outstanding. Please......
